description:
This package contains the official CRM 2015 SDK tools authored by the Microsoft Dynamics CRM SDK team.

The included command line tools are installed in the project's bin\coretools folder.
releaseNotes:
This package contains tools from the Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 SDK release. These tools may be used for application and solution development. The Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2 must be installed on the computer where these tools are to execute.

7.0.0.3: Added the Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CodeGeneration.dll assembly for use with developer extensions.
7.0.0.2: Added the WebsiteCopy.exe tool for portal development
7.0.0.1: final (RTM) CRM 2015 SDK tools
7.0.0:  preview CRM 2015 SDK tools
summary: Tools required to develop managed code applications and solutions for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 and Microsoft Dynamics Online.
title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 SDK core tools
